review_data.title: Top Bar for Wine - Price / Quality ratio unbeaten in ZÜRICH
review_data.content: This concept is nice. You can choose from about 25 wines of the daily list. But you can also make a choice from above a 100 wines if you decide to get a whole bottle of wine. Prices amongst the best in ZÜRICH. Also good...More

review_data.title: Great lunch!
review_data.content: I love risotto and am of the opinion that most restaurants don’t get it right... it’s usually bland or too dry or been sitting & I can make it better at home. D-vino got it right yesterday ... it was even better than my own...More

review_data.title: Comfortable Wine Bar
review_data.content: D-Vino is the one bar in Zurich I feel comfortable going to alone. The open atmosphere, comfortable lounge chairs, and steady stream of regulars... including other women drinking alone 😁, I find very inviting. The prices, for Zurich, are also good.

review_data.title: Great coffee in Zurich!

review_data.title: Sehr gutes Tartar
review_data.content: Sehr gutes Tartar. Flotter Service. Nette Bedienung. Teller sehr schön anngerichtet. Hutes Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis.

review_data.title: Nice wine tasting
review_data.content: Went there Yesterday for wine taste. Loved the wines and tapas was neat. The tapas was a mixture of cheese, neatly cooked meat balls and some dates wrapped in bacon. All are recommendable Further, the wine were good (the lowest had a 3.6 rating at...More

review_data.title: Gemütlich, angenehm und ruhig

review_data.title: Pleasantly surprised
review_data.content: The place is small but welcoming. Very similar to the other D-Vino. The staff was really nice and friendly. A glas of Verdejo fromSpain and one of Grüner Veltliner from Austria - nice and chill. We both had a curry which was good. Overall a...More

review_data.title: Great for Lunch time!!
review_data.content: Was here with some colleagues for a quick lunch. I had a nice plate of penne with Parmiggiano shavings, and a small salad. Service was very good and prompt. I liked this place. It's style is modern and has a nice lounge atmosphere!!

review_data.title: Great little bar!
review_data.content: A gem in the heart of pricy Bellevue. Decent variety of wine, and tasty well-priced finger food. Staff are friendly and the food always comes out quickly. My go-to bar in Zürich.
